kDesc
In celebration the first PSP® Mahjong game “DONGFANG QUESHEN” created by XPEC，the Taiwanese game developing company！PS Home team has a small gift to everyone. [#Legal]

首次公開介紹，台灣遊戲開發商樂陞科技XPEC，慶祝首創PSP®麻將作品『東方雀神』！這件東方雀神扇是PS Home團隊送給您的一份小禮物，敬請享受吧！ [#Legal]
